start: ^Wow, I can’t believe we’ve already made it this far. We still have a long drive ahead before we reach the campground.
^Yep, we're pretty far away from home.

c-1: ^We have about 2 more hours until we make it into the mountains. There, we should start seeing more trees.

resOne: ^What time will we get to the campground?

c-0: ^Yeah, we'll need some food and drinks. If there's anything else you think we will need, grab it.
c-1: ^Later in the afternoon, probably around 7 PM before it gets dark. Could you grab some food and supplies inside the gas station?

resTwo: ^Looking forward to getting out of this barren wasteland.

c-0: ^Me too. Can you go inside and get us some food and drinks for the campsite? We don't have much in the cooler we brought. Grab other supplies too.
c-1: ^Yeah, could you get us some food and drinks? We will need some for tonight. Grab anything else that we'll need.
